verbs.description: The actor [V: has] dumped on Trump for years ; why did POTUS wait so long to punch back ?
[ARG0: The actor] has [V: dumped] [ARG2: on Trump] [ARGM-TMP: for years] ; why did POTUS wait so long to punch back ?
The actor has dumped on Trump for years ; why [V: did] POTUS wait so long to punch back ?
The actor has dumped on Trump for years ; [ARGM-CAU: why] did [ARG1: POTUS] [V: wait] [ARGM-TMP: so long] [ARG2: to punch back] ?
The actor has dumped on Trump for years ; why did POTUS wait so long to [V: punch] back ?
